title: Shadows and Shimmer: stories
description: In this collection of bittersweet short stories, Patrick Seda transports us deep into shadows with stories that leave us unsettled and uneasy, then lifts us into the lightness of shimmer with stories that bring a smile to our hearts. Stylish and deeply clever, these delights contain unexpected twists and are presented as fairy tales, speculative fiction, ghost stories, and poetic verse.
author: Patrick Seda
